tool.name: CAT prepare
tool.description: a database for CAT - Contig Annotation Tool
tool.command: #import os.path #set $catdb = $cat_db.files_path mkdir -p $catdb && echo CAT_DB `date '+%Y-%m-%d'` "@DATABASE_FOLDER@" "@TAXONOMY_FOLDER@" > $cat_db && CAT prepare --fresh --database_folder '$os.path.join($catdb,"@DATABASE_FOLDER@")' --taxonomy_folder '$os.path.join($catdb,"@TAXONOMY_FOLDER@")'
tool.help:
**CAT prepare**
Prepare CAT reference data for classifying metagomic contigs or genome assemblies.
**NOTE:** This requires over a 100GB of RAM, 250GB of disk space, and up to 24 hours.
@COMMON_HELP@
